description:
For some reason, Kotarou is very particular about his tissues. He wants expensive, soft ones because they`re "sweet". Later, Karino figures out why.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Kodawari no Tissue / Minna o Goshoutai / Engiha Kotarou / Hoshi no Furu Yoru ni / Nichiyoubi na no ni...... / Sono Hara wa?
こだわりのティッシュ / みんなを御招待 / 演技派コタロー / 星の降る夜に / 日曜日なのに...... / その腹は?
